column1: Baby Barnaby's////Perfectly charming first impressions. We were there when the doors opened and within the first fifteen minutes
column2: it was almost packed. Everybody was perky and cheerful which is great for us morning people. Fresh coffee awaited us  at the table
column3: made especially for Baby Barnaby's. Trivial pursuit cards kept us entertained after the meal as I enjoyed another cup of the wonderful coffee. I couldn't have asked for a better breakfast. Everything tastes fresh. My boyfriend doesn't even like eggs that much  and he raved about the ones on his plate.  They had some healthy choices for breakfast too.
